1 pound boneless, skinless salmon fillets,½ cup baking mix (such as Bisquick),½ cup diced onion,¼ cup diced red bell pepper,¼ cup freshly chopped parsley,1 large egg,3 cloves garlic, minced,½ teaspoon Worcestershire sauce,¼ teaspoon seasoned salt,¼ teaspoon seafood seasoning (such as Old Bay),⅓ cup cornmeal,2 tablespoons vegetable oil,,
